Address: ONE TECHNOLOGY DRIVE, MILPITAS, California, 95035, United States of America
CompanyDescription: KLA Corporation ("KLA" or the "Company" and also referred to as "we" or "our") is a leading supplier of process equipment, process control equipment, and data analytics products for a broad range of industries, including semiconductors, printed circuit boards and displays. We provide advanced process control and process-enabling solutions for manufacturing and testing wafers and reticles, integrated circuits ("IC" or "chip"), packaging, light emitting diodes, power devices, compound semiconductor devices, microelectromechanical systems, data storage, printed circuit boards and flat and flexible panel displays, as well as general materials research. On February 20, 2019, we completed the acquisition of Orbotech, Ltd. ("Orbotech") for a total purchase consideration of approximately $3.26 billion. For additional details, refer to Note 6 "Business Combinations" to our Consolidated Financial Statements.  ... More ...
